SELECT tu.user_id, tu.user_code, tu.user_name, tu.sex, tu.user_status, tu.phone, tu.mobile, tu.email, tr.role_code, group_concat(tr.role_name) AS role_name FROM tm_user tu LEFT JOIN tr_user_role tur ON tu.user_id = tur.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tm_role.role_id, tm_role.role_code, tm_role.role_name FROM tm_role WHERE tm_role.is_delete = ${@com.sandrew.bootcas.core.common.Constants@IF_TYPE_NO} AND tm_role.role_status = ${@com.sandrew.bootcas.core.common.Constants@STATUS_ENABLE} ) tr ON tr.role_id = tur.role_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND user_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.userCode},'%')
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.userName},'%')
AND user_status = #{condition.userStatus}
AND tu.is_delete = ${@com.sandrew.bootcas.core.common.Constants@IF_TYPE_NO} GROUP BY user_code,is_delete
select tr.* from tm_role tr JOIN tr_user_role tur ON tr.role_id = tur.role_id WHERE tur.user_id = #{_parameter}

select tr.role_id, tr.role_code, tr.role_name, tr.role_type, tr.role_status from tm_role tr where tr.role_status = ${@com.sandrew.bootcas.core.common.Constants@STATUS_ENABLE} and not exists ( select 1 from tr_user_role tur where tr.role_id = tur.role_id and tur.user_id = #{userId})
and tr.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
mapper.update: update tm_user tu set tu.avatar = null, tu.update_date = #{updateDate, jdbcType=DATE}, tu.update_by = #{updateBy, jdbcType=INTEGER} where tu.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
